summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the 1997 Seattle Building Code, Chapter 22.100 of the Seattle Municipal Code, as adopted by Ordinance 119079 and amended by Ordinance 120157: amending Sections 103, 104, 106, 202, 206, 302, 307, 310, 311, 313, 402, 403, 404, 405, 502, 601, 711, 715, 902, 904, 905, 1003, 1004, 1005, 1206, 1506, 3002, 3003, 3004, 3011, 3013, 3016, 3022, 3027, 3202, 3404, Tables 5-A, 10-A, 16-A, 23-II-I-1, and 23-II-I-2 of the Seattle Building Code.
